document.full_text: a night after manager terry collins dropped the struggling jason bay to sixth in the mets' order, bay's name was not on the lineup card for sunday night's series finale against the atlanta braves.
document.title: mets leave bay out of lineup
lines_and_colors: a night after manager terry collins dropped the struggling jason bay to sixth in the mets' order, bay's name was not on the lineup card for sunday night's series finale against the atlanta braves.
